item1: ITEM 1. BUSINESS Exxon Mobil Corporation incorporated State New Jersey 1882. Divisions affiliated companies ExxonMobil operate market products United States most other countries world. principal business involves exploration for, production of, crude oil natural gas; manufacture, trade, transport sale crude oil, natural gas, petroleum products, petrochemicals, wide variety specialty products; pursuit lower-emission other new business opportunities, including carbon capture storage, hydrogen, lower-emission fuels, Proxxima TM systems, carbon materials, lithium.
item2: ITEM 2. MANAGEMENT'S DISCUSSION ANALYSIS FINANCIAL CONDITION RESULTS OPERATIONS During third quarter 2025, price crude oil increased slightly relative second quarter 2025, remaining near middle 10-year historical range (2010-2019) supported strong demand despite increased OPEC+ supply. Natural gas prices remained top 10-year range robust global demand. Global industry refining margins moved toward top 10-year historical range third quarter, impacted industry supply outages coupled strong demand.
